name: Deel Op Leesmee
author: Frank Slegers

sections.description:
A simple plugin that adds a ‘Deel op Leesmee’ button at the bottom of all your posts.
Leesmee.com is a Dutch social news website with communities.
sections.installation:
DUTCH

Installeer rechtstreeks in je WordPress site (Ga naar Plugins -> Add New), selecteer the zip file van de plugin en activeer de plugin.

Of

Installeer manueel in je WP plugins directory
1. Unzip*deel-op-leesmee.zip*in de `/wp-content/plugins/ directory.
2. Activeer de plugin via het Plugins menu in WordPress.
3. Klaar!!

ENGLISH

  • Install directly from WordPress (just go to Plugins -> Add New), select the downloaded zip file for the plugin and and activate.

Or

  • Manually install to your WP plugins directory
    1. Unzip*deel-op-leesmee.zip*in the `/wp-content/plugins/ directory.
    2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
    3. All Done!
